modShortDescription: Bringing back the Blessed Metal Mod, this can be crafted after the schematic is obtained through looting then learned.
modDescription:
Bringing back the Blessed Metal Mod, this can be crafted after the schematic is obtained through looting then learned. The schematic loot drop probability is akin to the Rad Remover Mod.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15PnRd08dDeVNLqcGlYs6mII0zGLDEMO_/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21494-alucards-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Noisy Pants](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/noisy-pants/)
